name: New Salt Lake City Airport - #AirportsREVEALED
description:
In this video, we’ll explore the old and new Salt Lake City International Airports. 

It’s not often you see an airport build a new airport, but Salt Lake City Airport did it! 

We’ll take a look at how they built Salt Lake City Airport, why they built Salt Lake City Airport, and what’s better about the new design of Salt Lake City Airport. 

We’ll check out both landslide and airside of the new Salt Lake City Airport. We’ll even look at the art collection and sweeping views at Salt Lake City Airport.

0:00 Introduction and Welcome
2:15 The Old Salt Lake City Airport Terminal
3:50 The New Salt Lake City Airport Terminal
8:14 Final Thoughts about Salt Lake City Airport

The 767-400 That Took Us Home:
https://youtu.be/N3GF3cJI1_M

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel! 
http://www.JebBrooksFlies.com

Malleable (Sting) - Peter Sandberg
